title: Stephen Hawking and Jane Wilde
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Stephen Hawking and Jane Wilde.

hook.text: Doctors gave him two years to live. She married him anyway. Their love sustained the greatest mind in physics.

buildup.text: Jane Wilde married Stephen Hawking in 1965, knowing his motor neuron disease would progressively disable him.

discovery.text: Jane became Stephen's caregiver, mother to their three children, and the anchor that let him focus on cosmology.

twist.text: The marriage eventually broke under the strain. They divorced in 1995. Jane later wrote candidly about the cost.

climax.text: Jane's love gave Stephen decades he wasn't supposed to have. The cost was her own dreams â€” a painful exchange.

punchline.text: Jane gave Stephen decades of life. The cost was years of her own.

quiz.question: How long was Stephen Hawking expected to live when Jane married him?
